data.eml:eml: This dataset is the databased part of mosses and lichens from the botanical collections of the Musée des Confluences (Lyon). It comprises 52 specimens belonging to different collections, particularly some specimens gathered by Mrs Bélonie Chantre in minor Asia including two syntypes of lichens. Some samples of lichens (and a Lycopodium) have been collected by Gaston Buchet in Iceland and Canaries Islands. A third part (mosses) is issued from Marmorat's collection.
